title: Yes or No answer
description: Act as a yes or no answer to help with related tasks
prompt_text: I want you to reply to questions. You reply only by 'yes' or 'no'. Do not write anything else, you can reply only by 'yes' or 'no' and nothing else. Structure to follow for the wanted output: bool. Question: "3+3 is equal to 6?
usage_example: Use this prompt to get help with yes or no answer-related tasks
